title: I Leveled up but I didn't get Any Champion Capsule or BE
body:
Hello

While I was playing League, I was trying to farm up XP so I can get blue essence as I only need about 100 more to get a new mystery champ, but when I leveled up from lv 35 to lv 36, it didn't give me anything. 
Did I do something wrong?

Thank you
Emergency Player

replies.body: It does look like some players have been missing some random levelup capsules. So far I haven't been able to notice a trend on specific levels or anything, but it's easy enough to match up. Check your loot again when you can and you should have that capsule now!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BF9j2R4m,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-27T05:42:00.884+0000)
>
> It does look like some players have been missing some random levelup capsules. So far I haven't been able to notice a trend on specific levels or anything, but it's easy enough to match up. Check your loot again when you can and you should have that capsule now!

It's been 12+ hours and I still haven't gotten my capsule for reaching level 35.

Edit: 3 days later, I finally got it.

Update: I just got a notification that I received a capsule. But nothing new was in my Loot tab.

Edit: 12 hours later I got it.
I had the same error.
Whelp, it took about 3 days, but I finally got my capsule.
Did it show up in your loot space?
Yes.
I got it!!! Thank you so much for helping me!!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BF9j2R4m,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-27T05:42:00.884+0000)
>
> It does look like some players have been missing some random levelup capsules. So far I haven't been able to notice a trend on specific levels or anything, but it's easy enough to match up. Check your loot again when you can and you should have that capsule now!

I have been checking all day, but still didn't get the previous missing one. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
is there an estimated time when this may be fixed? i'm scared to play because i didn't get my last capsule and don't want to miss out on another one.
ive posted for 37th lvl that i didint get capsule still waiting for response or fix been waiting for ~2 days
Checked out your post and it looks like Porocles mentioned wanting to have you submit a ticket to look into it, were you able to get that sent in yet?
yes https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/32768140

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BF9j2R4m,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-27T05:42:00.884+0000)
>
> It does look like some players have been missing some random levelup capsules. So far I haven't been able to notice a trend on specific levels or anything, but it's easy enough to match up. Check your loot again when you can and you should have that capsule now!

This happened to me too, after a co-op game. Same levels.
I also didn't get anything from my last level up, 34 to 35.

> [{quoted}](name=Mariner,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BF9j2R4m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-27T02:35:39.737+0000)
>
> I also didn't get anything from my last level up, 34 to 35.

I had the same levelup and got nothing.
Didn't get anything when I reached lvl 40 and I was hoping to finally get zed after trying to save for so long{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I would like to report that I am experiencing this same issue
Same problem going from 33-34. I got the popups telling me I received a capsule and BE, but then no Capsule once I opened up Loot.
I also did not receive a capsule for going from 37 to 38...

Same problem here from 32 to 33... played several times since then, relogged like 10 times, still recieved nothing :(
Anyone has some solutions about this yet?
I didn't get one either when I leveled from 26 - 27, really disappointing because I started pretty recently (right after the BE change), and it takes forever to get any champions.
I didn't get a capsule for attaining level 41.
I also did not receive a capsule for going from 35 to 36.
i am having the same problem as everyone else her and i did submit a ticket but idk how long it will take to be read  do u have an estimated time someone will reach my ticket
I did not recieve my capsule on the 37 to 38 levelup

This must be a bug of some sort, I also leveled up from 37 to 38 and I didn't receive a capsule or a screen saying I leveled up. I just submitted a bug report, hopefully Riot reads it. I'm really confused about it, glad to see in not the other one.
same here
Same here just lvld and received nothing from 32-33 hope to hear something about this
